messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] illinois conferences
messages.msgSnippet: Evanston Homeschool Educators is having a miniconference in June and Northside Unschoolers (Chicago) are having a one day fair/workshop in the spring.  You can
messages.messageBody:
Evanston Homeschool Educators is having a miniconference in June and Northside Unschoolers (Chicago) are having a one day fair/workshop in the spring. You can get more info at their websites (at least who to call re: more information).
Sheila
----- Original Message -----
From: Barda A. Allen
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, February 12, 2003 8:38 AM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] illinois conferences


> ________________________________________________________________________
>
> Message: 2
> Date: Tue, 11 Feb 2003 22:12:57 EST
> From: ejcrewe@...
> Subject: Re: illinois conferences
>
> In a message dated 2/11/2003 8:27:26 PM Central Standard Time,
> Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
>
>
>> Are these conferences that you are talking about primarily in California?
>> How do I find them in my area (IL)?
>
> Illinois HOUSE, not solely unschooling, typically presents an annual
> conference. This year's was cancelled due to a problem with the facility, as
> I understand. It's usually in March. We had a great time last year, and it
> totally sold Mark, my DH, on unschooling.


Clonlara, an Alternative School with a HBEP in Ann Arbor, Michigan has a
yearly conference in the spring.
The conference is generally held somewhere near Ann Arbor, Great Conference,
I highly recommend it. And driving there from Illinois is a piece of cake
compared to Montana!


Peace and Love...
Barda Allen
315 State Street
Helena, MT 59601
406-449-7513
HeavensOnEarth@...

messages.subject: Re: illinois conferences
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 2/11/2003 8:27:26 PM Central Standard Time, ... Illinois HOUSE, not solely unschooling, typically presents an annual conference.  This
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/11/2003 8:27:26 PM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> Are these conferences that you are talking about primarily in California?
> How do I find them in my area (IL)?

Illinois HOUSE, not solely unschooling, typically presents an annual
conference. This year's was cancelled due to a problem with the facility, as
I understand. It's usually in March. We had a great time last year, and it
totally sold Mark, my DH, on unschooling.

Elizabeth
